regions.name: Aurelia
regions.description: Golden fields, temples, and capital of divine influence.

regions.name: Verdancia
regions.description: Ancient forestland filled with fae ruins and druidic culture.

regions.name: Durndara
regions.description: Mountainous realm of dwarven forges and volcanic terrain.

regions.name: Selenora
regions.description: Moonlit mystic region with floating forests and astral temples.

regions.name: Tharnor
regions.description: War-torn deserts and necrotic battlefields swept by sandstorms.

regions.name: Vokaria
regions.description: Ocean-drowned ruins ruled by storm altars and serpent clans.
